item.description:
To celebrate the success of the Architecture of Worcester Gallery Show- we invite you all to join us and participate in a reception for all the artists and supporters of the Worcester Photography Center on  Sept. 16th at 5:30. It will be held at  60 Franklin Street Downtown Worcester. 

 

The Show is officially hung and viewable at Worcester's City Hall. Simply enter from the under ground garage at the back of City Hall and you will be walking straight into the gallery area. Please stop by and view this great work.

 

The hearsay as of today 8/25:

The Cultural Coalition could provide entertainment and feature walking tours of the Worcester Windows.

 

We will make this opening the featured event for the Worcester Cultural Coalition’s annual meeting. There will be an annual meeting 4:30-5:30 in City Hall. The reception /opening will take place in 60 Franklin Street 5:30-7PM. We will walk the attendees from the annual meeting through the amazing Worcester Photographer’s show on the ground level of City Hall over to the reception.

 

All are welcome to join us!

Some of the comments we have had so far:

" Donna---Wow! Some amazing work. Great selection- thanks to all of you for the creative effort. The images of the Woo are inspirations. Thanks for the creativity you and the photographers, and PW have put into this effort. "

Erin I. Williams

Cultural Development Officer

City of Worcester

 

"The work is very beautiful and so diverse. Really excellent selections, which is the perfect way to begin your first gallery exhibition at City Hall!" Thanks again,

Bethany

Worcester Windows

 

And check out the WOMAG article written by Paul G the week of July 28th: http://tiny.cc/fbhty

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Architecture of Worcester Gallery Show Reception
